title: ImageDrawImage
name: ImageDrawImage
description: this function is deprecated, use ImagePaste instead. Draws a image on a image with the baseline of the first character positioned at (x,y) in the image.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: the image to draw on it

arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the of the top left corner of the image to draw.

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the of the top left corner of the image to draw.
